name: aquatour-crm
buildCommand: curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.22.0-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && rm -f pubspec.lock && flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && (flutter pub get || (cp pubspec-minimal.yaml pubspec.yaml && flutter pub get)) && flutter build web --release
